As of January 2025, we have officially launched the Center of Excellence (COEX), a transformative initiative focused on optimizing our end-to-end operations, enhancing efficiency, and improving customer and brand satisfaction. This is a major step forward in our journey toward operational excellence, reinforcing our commitment to innovation and continuous improvement.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/39cf54f913385d609d403c003a282e9d1562491273.png> 	

Under the leadership of Joseph Sabbagh- VP Center of Excellence, who will continue to report to Andreu Marco- Chief Operations Officer,  COEX will streamline processes across key areas and functions. Joseph has been with the Group for over 30 years leading accross differenct functions in Logistics, Supply Chain, Retail, and Country Management in Kuwait. In 2020, he transitioned to our Group's main office, where his contributions played a key role in transforming store operations across the region. 


The goal of CoEx is to create a seamless, data-driven, and efficient operational model aligned with the long-term Strategy of our Group Operations with key focus areas being:


LEAN TRANSFORMATION 
Led by Abdallah Tannoury, Manager- Lean Transformation, will focus on redesigning operating models through LEAN and KAIZEN initiatives to streamline E2E processes, drive cost savings and improve lead times.


 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/7aa6cf39c2c4e53c3c718c3336d627922101261203.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/76e814b4e8e9d7329da02fb26c7d3a881694398539.png>

LEAN TRANSFORMATION 
Led by Abdallah Tannoury, Manager- Lean Transformation, will focus on redesigning operating models through LEAN and KAIZEN initiatives to streamline E2E processes, drive cost savings and improve lead times.


 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/7aa6cf39c2c4e53c3c718c3336d627922101261203.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/76e814b4e8e9d7329da02fb26c7d3a881694398539.png> 	

PROCESS & EFFICIENCY 
Led by Ahmad Shikh Ard, Director- Process & Efficiency, will focus on optimizing & streamlining processes through digitalization and put in place best-in class practices and standards 


RETAIL STORE OPERATIONS
Led by Hasna Raissi, Director- Retail Store Operations, will focus on overseeing retail operations, optimizing stock accuracy, and aligning processes with customer needs and organizational goals.


 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/99ffc4ee7d0338126ce4d557db045864573344927.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/78ef1a442886df361d63cbe9f1f75c5d1713439832.png> 	

OPERATIONS ANALYTICS
Led by Maelina Esguerra, Manager- Data & Analytics, will focus on  providing tools for measuring performance and driving continuous improvement.


This new structure eliminates redundancies, streamlines workflows, and uses advanced analytics and technology to improve decision-making. We are excited about the opportunities this transformation will bring and look forward to achieving operational excellence together. 


Stay tuned for further updates!
